items: INR: Spine <= 1.4; extremity injection <= 3.0; extremity aspiration <= 2.0
Patients on anticoagulants should have nursing alerts triggered when scheduled.
When drugs are combined (e.g., aspirin + clopidogrel), consider the stricter hold guidance.
Proceduralist may proceed outside these ranges if, in their judgment, benefits outweigh risks.

blocks.text: Switch to view holds for the selected procedure.
